titleStmt.title: The parish-clerk's vade mecum, or, An alphabetical concordance of the most material words and sentences in the book of singing Psalms used in Parish churches, pointing out also psalms suited to all the great festivals of the Church of England, and most other special occasions, useful for all such as would sing with the spirit and with the understanding also / by B.P. ...
titleStmt.author: B. P., Parish clerk.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Benj. Motte ..., and to be sold by Randal Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
